text: Wendy Schaal (born July 2, 1954) is an American actress. She starred in Seth MacFarlane's animated series American Dad! She was born in Chicago, Illinois. She is currently married. Her father was actor Richard Schaal. Valerie Harper is her former step-mother. ==Filmography== ===Animated television=== *The Fairly OddParents – Additional voices *American Dad! – Francine Smith *Powerpuff Girls – Woman Walla, Imaginary Rabbit ==Other websites== * Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Chicago Category:Comedians from Chicago
title: Wendy Schaal
